name: 10a0eefd-1ece-509f-b6b0-fac5c8d9cb46
notes: This service provides nephelometer measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles observed at Preila, Lithuania (20130101 - 20140430). The observations contain level 2 data. The time resolution is 1h. The observations are stored in the EBAS database (http://ebas.nilu.no/).
title: Measurements of volume scattering coefficient in air due to dried aerosol particles at Preila, Lithuania (20130101 - 20140430)
